resources.string: No OIDs available. Please add at least one OID to the query management.
SNMP query did not work. Please check if the OIDs are correct.
WIFI not active. WIFI is going to be activated.
Place the QR-Code into the marked area.
Click return on your device to move to the menu.

Please use this format to make your QR-Code for a WIFI QR-Code:

"WIFI:S:<SSID>;T:<WPA|WEP|>;P:<password>;;"
For a SNMP QR-Code please use this as a format:

{
"snmpVersion":"3",
"user":
"root",
"target": "private",
"pw": "asdf212!",
"enc": {
 "auth": "SHA",
 "priv": "AES-256",
 "privKey": "asdf121!"
},
"naddr": {
 "IPv4": "192.168.0.25",
 "IPv6": "2a56:0:1"
}
}

To connect to the WIFI just scan the WIFI-QR-Code.
Then your device will connect to the WIFI.

To connect to a SNMP-Device scan the SNMP-QR-Code
The app will save the device with its information in devicemanager.
How do i use the app?
